post.body: heehee!!! Momma Mia here I go again my my.....
babe do we need to talk?
so thankful for a precious mom who wipes away the tears and for an amazing man who is so patient and loves me thru it all!!! G'Night
....so ready to get off work.... Working to 6 on the day after Christmas is CRAP!!! Regions should close at least at 2!!
.....My day just got TONS better!!! @iammarshall is coming to eat lunch with me!!!!
....watchin Mamma Mia with @iammarshall and my mom!!!! Merry Christmas All!
....Stockings hung.....check .....Sauage Balls made.....check ......Presents wrapped....oh crap knew I forgot something!! Merry Chri ...
...so glad to be done with work till Friday!!! Waiting on @iammarshall to get off work!!! Merry Merry Christmas to EVERYONE!!!!
....so ready to be off work at 12!!!
...:Just a spoonful of sugar
....due to lack of food today results in my previous statement!!
.finally eating my first meal of the day! Slept in, White Christmas @ Alabama, candellight service w my folks! Great Day!! 3 mon from now!
...at the beautiful Alabama Theater to see White Christmas with @iammarshall and Phil and Colleen!!!!
...mark your calendars folks March 21 is the date!!!!! I am becoming a Ford!!! http://blog.johndavidwright.com engagment pics!
http://blog.johndavidwright.com engagement pics!! Whoop whoop
I LOVE MARSHALL FORD!!!!
http://blog.johndavidwright.com to see some engagment shots!!!!!!
......oh bed my bed how I wish I could crawl back in!!!
...anybody seen @iammarshall?
.......things are lookin brighter!!!! This week I still have a job!! Praise God! I will continue to trust!!
